scripts.linux_pre_release: cd target/release && zip -r dprint-plugin-exec-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.zip dprint-plugin-exec dprint-plugin-exec && echo "::set-output name=ZIP_CHECKSUM::$(shasum -a 256 dprint-plugin-exec-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.zip | awk '{print $1}')"
scripts.mac_pre_release: cd target/release && zip -r dprint-plugin-exec-x86_64-apple-darwin.zip dprint-plugin-exec dprint-plugin-exec && echo "::set-output name=ZIP_CHECKSUM::$(shasum -a 256 dprint-plugin-exec-x86_64-apple-darwin.zip | awk '{print $1}')"
scripts.windows_pre_release: cd target/release && zip -r dprint-plugin-exec-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.zip dprint-plugin-exec dprint-plugin-exec && echo "::set-output name=ZIP_CHECKSUM::$(shasum -a 256 dprint-plugin-exec-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.zip | awk '{print $1}')"
scripts.test_release: yarn build_release && yarn linux_pre_release && yarn mac_pre_release && yarn windows_pre_release && yarn create_test_plugin_file
